targets.queryText:
select stream_id as "Stream ID", b.address as "Factory", start_block as "Start Block", end_block as "End Block", c.symbol as "Token", d.address as "From", e.address as "To", reason as "Reason", amount_per_second as "Amount Per Second", status as "Status", txgroup as "TxGroup"
from streams a
left join addresses b on a.contract = b.address_id
left join tokens c on a.token = c.token_id
left join addresses d on a.from_address = d.address_id
left join addresses e on a.to_address = e.address_id
targets.rawQueryText:
select stream_id as "Stream ID", b.address as "Factory", start_block as "Start Block", end_block as "End Block", c.symbol as "Token", d.address as "From", e.address as "To", reason as "Reason", amount_per_second as "Amount Per Second", status as "Status", txgroup as "TxGroup"
from streams a
left join addresses b on a.contract = b.address_id
left join tokens c on a.token = c.token_id
left join addresses d on a.from_address = d.address_id
left join addresses e on a.to_address = e.address_id
